column5: Electrofishing Volunteer Day, September 12, 2009  www.creditvalleyca.ca  Help monitor the health of the river by volunteering at an electrofishing station near you. This monitoring technique is used to inventory fish species and populations.   Location: Silver Creek upstream of Highway 7 (Norval)  Time: 9 a.m.  Cost: Free  Contact: Registration Questions: Contact [email protected] or 905-670-1615 x221  Electrofishing Questions: Contact Jon Clayton at [email protected] or 905-670-1615 x434
